name: Dr. Jane Doe
experience: Over 10 years of experience in private practice and hospital settings, working with adults and adolescents.
description: Dr. Jane Doe is a compassionate and experienced clinical psychologist with over 10 years of practice. She specializes in helping individuals overcome anxiety, depression, and trauma. Her integrative approach combines evidence-based techniques with a client-centered, strengths-based philosophy.

name: Dr. Rajesh Singh
experience: 15 years of experience in private practice and counseling centers, working with individuals and couples.
description: Dr. Rajesh Singh is a dedicated clinical psychologist based in New Delhi. With a focus on stress management, relationship counseling, and enhancing self-esteem, he strives to create a supportive environment for his clients to grow and heal.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
experience: 12 years of experience in child and adolescent psychology, working in schools and private practice.
description: Dr. Priya Sharma is a child psychologist with a passion for supporting young minds. She specializes in child and adolescent psychology, focusing on parent-child relationships and academic support. Dr. Sharma believes in nurturing the potential in every child.

name: Dr. Ayesha Khan
experience: 8 years of experience in couples therapy and marital counseling.
description: Dr. Ayesha Khan is a skilled couples therapist based in Mumbai. With expertise in marital conflict resolution and intimacy issues, she is dedicated to helping couples strengthen their relationships and find joy in their connections.

name: Dr. Shivani Patel
experience: 9 years of experience in treating anxiety disorders, working in clinics and online therapy.
description: Shivani Patel is a compassionate therapist specializing in anxiety disorders, panic attacks, and phobias. Through evidence-based techniques and a personalized approach, she empowers her clients to overcome their fears and live fulfilling lives.

name: Dr. Vikram Singhania
experience: 14 years of experience in mental health counseling, working in hospitals and private practice.
description: Dr. Vikram Singhania is a seasoned mental health counselor based in Bangalore. He specializes in treating depression, bipolar disorder, and anger management. Dr. Singhania believes in providing a safe space for his clients to explore their emotions and find healing.
